Testing VPMULLW instruction
==========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Operand A: 1000 -2000 3000 -4000 5000 -6000 7000 -8000 
Operand B: -1500 2500 -3500 4500 -5500 6500 -7500 8500 
Result: 7328 -19264 -14240 22400 25120 -6080 -5664 26368 
Expected: 7328 -19264 -14240 22400 25120 -6080 -5664 26368 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit boundary values
Operand A: 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 32767 -32768 
Operand B: -32768 32767 32767 -32768 -32768 32767 32767 -32768 
Result: -32768 -32768 1 0 -32768 -32768 1 0 
Expected: -32768 -32768 1 0 -32768 -32768 1 0 
[PASS]

Test 3: 128-bit memory operand
Operand A (register): 5000 -6000 7000 -8000 9000 -10000 11000 -12000 
Operand B (memory): -4000 6500 -7500 8500 -9500 10500 -11500 12500 
Result: -11520 -6080 -5664 26368 24480 -11328 -15520 11904 
Expected: -11520 -6080 -5664 26368 24480 -11328 -15520 11904 
[PASS]

Test 4: 256-bit AVX operation
Operand A: 1000 -2000 3000 -4000 5000 -6000 7000 -8000 9000 -10000 11000 -12000 13000 -14000 15000 -16000 
Operand B: -1500 2500 -3500 4500 -5500 6500 -7500 8500 -9500 10500 -11500 12500 -13500 14500 -15500 16500 
Result: 7328 -19264 -14240 22400 25120 -6080 -5664 26368 24480 -11328 -15520 11904 5408 30528 21728 -20992 
Expected: 7328 -19264 -14240 22400 25120 -6080 -5664 26368 24480 -11328 -15520 11904 5408 30528 21728 -20992 
[PASS]

VPMULLW tests PASSED
